response.original_title: Kaleo: In the Shadow of the Colosseum
response.overview: Experience the once-in-a-lifetime concert that electrified the ancient world. Icelandic rockers Kaleo, celebrated for their Grammy nominated music and electrifying live performances, deliver a historic show at the iconic Colosseum in Rome. Join the band as they perform their greatest hits, including "No Good", "All The Pretty Girls", and "Way Down We Go", in the shadow of this legendary monument. Filmed with stunning cinematography, the special captures the raw energy and intimate atmosphere of the performance. Witness the band's passion and connection with their fans as they bring their music to life in one of the most extraordinary venues on Earth.
response.title: Kaleo: In the Shadow of the Colosseum
